item.name: [MySQL] Global Status: Bytes Received (per second)
item.description: The number of bytes received from all clients.

item.name: [MySQL] Global Status: Bytes Sent (per second)
item.description: The number of bytes sent to all clients.

item.name: [MySQL] Global Status: Created Tmp - Disk Tables
[MySQL] Global Status: Key Blocks - Not Flushed
item.description: The number of key blocks in the key cache that have changed but have not yet been flushed to disk.

item.name: [MySQL] Global Status: Key Blocks - Unused
item.description: The number of unused blocks in the key cache.

item.name: [MySQL] Global Status: Key Blocks - Used
item.description: The number of used blocks in the key cache. This value is a high-water mark that indicates the maximum number of blocks that have ever been in use at one time.

item.name: [MySQL] Global Status: Key - Reads
item.description: The number of physical reads of a key block from disk.

item.name: [MySQL] Global Status: Key - Read Requests
item.description: The number of requests to read a key block from the cache.

item.name: [MySQL] Global Status: Key - Writes
item.description: The number of physical writes of a key block to disk.

item.name: [MySQL] Global Status: Key - Write Requests
item.description: The number of requests to write a key block to the cache.

item.name: [MySQL] General: Status
item.description: 0 - MySQL server is down 1 - MySQL server is up

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template DB MySQL:mysbix[replication_masters, Master_Server_Id:{#MASTER_ID}, Slave_IO_Running].last(#3)}=0 or {Template DB MySQL:mysbix[replication_masters, Master_Server_Id:{#MASTER_ID}, Slave_SQL_Running].last(#3)}=0
trigger_prototype.name: MySQL: Replication Master "{#MASTER_HOST}" is not running
MySQL: Replication Master "{#MASTER_HOST}" is not syncing
trigger_prototype.description:
The replication is not synced, please check the slave status.
Seconds_Behind_Master: {ITEM.LASTVALUE1}
